Articles.Content:
Hey i was building a rover amd i thought letting him fly when he is on kerbal (or another planet) but then the solar panels can't extend because they wil break.

So i thought extendable/retractable wings would be a funny and maybe even great idea (for planes and rovers so if the plane go's in space you can retract your wings)

I REALLY WOULD LIKE IF IT WOULD BE IMPLEMENTED:):)
Get the robotics mod and make your own?
You might be able to do this with the hinges in Infernal Robotics.
Stock wings like that would be great.

You know what i mean

And i don't want to install mods

It would be good itpf this thread got more replies

No mod that aproves my idea?

Edited October 27, 2013 by vexx32
Posts merged. Please don't double/triple post.

infinite dice is working on a naval aircraft pack, and it has a pair of wings similar to what you mentioned, about halfway down, they fold, and lose all their lift. Probably won't be a stock feature, sorry, but mods are the way to go.
Robotics/moving parts is on the what-not-to-suggest list?

As Ernest3.14 mentioned, robotic and mechanical parts are on the What Not To Suggest list. It's not that it's a bad idea, it's simply that it's a very commonly discussed feature, and a plugin already exists for it. It is perfectly understandable if you don't want to install mods, but that simply means you may have to wait a long time for something like this.

Thread closed.
